boardgame.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mask – Base Set
boardgame.description: On the Threshold of Discovery! The ancient lands of Osirion are blanketed by the sands of time, and eldritch secrets and vast riches lie just beneath the sun-blistered surface. As modern Osirion opens its tombs to outsiders for the first time in centuries, many of these lost treasures and secrets are now emerging_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;some more malign than others. Can your group of heroes brave terrible guardians, foul cults, and the burning sands of the desert to stop the rebirth of an ancient tyrant?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This complete cooperative strategy game pits 1 to 4 heroes against the monsters, curses, and traps of the Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Mask Adventure Path. Choose your character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s class, build a deck of equipment, magic, and allies; and explore dangerous locations as you journey through an exciting fantasy tale. As your adventures continue, your characters add unique gear and awesome magic to their decks as they gain incredible powers, all of which they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need to challenge more and more powerful threats._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Mask Base Set includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;. More than 500 cards, featuring 7 character classes, a wide array of gear and magical treasures,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;and dozens of allies, monsters, and villains from the Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Mask storyline._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Half-Dead City Adventure Deck,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which begins your journey through the Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Mask Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;. A complete set of 5 polyhedral dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Shipping is from 43224. I will gladly combine shipping on multiple items purchased.

This listing includes the follow: Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mask Base Set Mummy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Mask Character Add-on Pack Adventure Paths 1-5 (#1 is included in the base set) Adventure Paths 4 and 5 are new and unused. This listing does not include the main game box or any of the adventure path boxes. All cards will be shipped in white long card boxes. Also include is the rulebook and dice. Everything except Adventure Paths 4 and 5 are sleeved in Mayday penny sleeves which will be included. Everything is in great shape as it was sleeved for all plays I will ship this via USPS Priority Mail so shipping is $13.50

Base game including all adventure decks, the character add-on deck and the promo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in the picture. The base game is optional. If you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want this the price is 125 euros. All decks are sealed. Please contact me for the shipping costs. PayPal or IBAN/BIC/SWIFT bank transfer. PayPal fee of +3,4% applies.
Never played. Free postage to U.K.

Opened to put in the adventure decks and character add-on deck, but never got around to playing - now must sell FULL SET * Base game * Character Add-on deck * Adventure Add-on decks 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 Shipping will be capped at $20. (refund issued on difference if actual shipping is less than $20)

*** SALE RESERVED FOR USER robercik0 *** I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling the base game plus all 6 adventure packs. Also included is the character pack. All cards are in near-mint condition. They have been played with but were always sleeved. Only a few cards out of the 1000+ have little dents or small nicks on them. The price includes shipping to Poland. Payment is through PayPal or bank transfer. Any questions? Please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask.
From GeekList Auction Includes base set, adventure paths, and promos as detailed there.
Reserved for brewgeek Used in really good condition Includes: - All expansions - Wooden insert - All cards are sleeved

This is the complete game, including all Adventure Packs but not the Character Add-on. I do not believe I have any promos. The cards are in perfect condition - they were only used when sleeved (Fantasy Flight). The box is in good condition but has a slight ding (no tear) on one corner. It comes with a homemade foamcore interior to store and sort the cards. Current price on CSI for the lot: $115. Asking $65 (unsleeved). Includes: [size=10][b]Base Game[/b][/size] [size=10][b]Homemade foam core organizer[/b][/size] [size=10][b]Expansions[/b][/size] Adventure Deck 2 - Empty Graves Adventure Deck 3 - Shifting Sands Adventure Deck 4 - Secrets of the Sphinx Adventure Deck 5 - The Slave Trenches of Hakotep Adventure Deck 6 - Pyramid of the Sky Pharaoh Shipping from Seattle, WA (98052). Beware this game is large and heavy - happy to arrange local pickup (Seattle, WA) to avoid costs! None of the listed prices include shipping.

This includes the base game, all 6 adventure decks, and the Character Add-on Deck. Base game, Character Add-on Deck, and Adventure Deck 1 have all been opened/played. Adventure Decks 2-6 are still sealed inside the boxes. Some of the boxes have some wear in the corners. ***Promos Included: Goblin Golem of Obsidian x 3, Hypogeum, Portable Sarcophagus, Mummify Self, Blessing of Khepri, Dance of the Dead, Sistrum of Bastet, Ring of Rejection, Reta Bigbad, Miau Pakhet x2, Tup (Some of these are slid in behind shrinked cards in each adventure box, some are already mixed in.) If you have any questions, please just let me know. Please send a geekmail for shipping cost estimate.
